name: dice roller (Ribnon)
description:
Controls:

right/middle mouse button hold and move to rotate camera
left click to select dice and confirm moves
right click to deselect dice

Rules:

Dice can move as many spaces on the board as the top face shows.

Dice move by rolling from space to space, that means the top faces changes each space and the change depends on the direction of the move

Dice can push one other (yours and opposing) dice. Pushed dice slide across the board and keep their orientation.

Opposing dice can be pushed off the board to remove them from the game
